files.README.md:
# RHDP Claude Code Marketplace

A marketplace repository for RHDP team Claude Code plugins.

## Installation

### Add the Marketplace
```bash
/plugin marketplace add rhpds/rhdp-claude-code-marketplace
```

### Install a Plugin
```bash
/plugin install showroom@rhdp-claude-code-marketplace
```

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [showroom](./showroom/) | Skills for Showroom lab authoring, review, testing, and content transformation |

## For Contributors

See [CLAUDE.md](./CLAUDE.md) for development guidelines.

## License

MIT
files.showroom/README.md:
# Showroom Plugin

Skills for Showroom lab authoring, review, testing, and content transformation.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin install showroom@rhdp-claude-code-marketplace
```

## Available Skills

### lab-review
AI-powered review of Showroom labs for content, correctness, and quality.

```bash
/showroom:lab-review
```

### blog-writer
Convert Showroom Asciidoc labs and demos into engaging technical blog articles.

```bash
/showroom:blog-writer
```

### content-transform
Transform content between different formats and structures.

```bash
/showroom:content-transform
```

## Directory Structure

```
showroom/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json      # Plugin metadata
├── skills/              # Skill definitions
│   ├── lab-review/
│   ├── blog-writer/
│   └── content-transform/
├── commands/            # Slash commands
├── hooks/               # Event hooks
└── mcp/                 # MCP server configs
```
